values: Okay where do i start, ummm i guess theres sooo much to say what has been going on in the past couple years that i dont feel like writing that much. Sooo ill keep it short and sweet. I love my new booo and my life has been completly flipped a 4-20. <- for the goood yeeeehhaa
Im back, i forgot but now i remebered. I love livejournal. i forgot how much i used to write in this. =)

Well things are just as a suspected....great ... I love living with my dad his girlfriend is starting to get used to me ... shes trying to make conversation somewhat when we talk. I havent even attended school yet but... i just took a test to get into Mott Middle...soo i can be dual enrolled too =) yay. Jer got a new car yesterday its nice....i miss the bird though... Jer and Me have been doing great i mean we get irratated with eachother but 2 secs after were back  a kissing and loving eachother... =) Just to think what the hell we have been though its soo weird... i mean he came down to Florida i cant belive it... im soo happy lalalalalalalaaaaaaaaaaa Muah!

I miss linds... xoxo

Sooo this is the deal... i didnt end up coming/driving by myself up here.... my dad flew down.and then me and ryan picked him up from the airport in my car and we drove back to MI ...

Jer and I are perfect we cant leave eachothers side anymore it feels like...I feel like i live at his house sometimes.. lol  Going to school tomm. thats going to be a little insane. Im glad Jackie and Nic are in the alternative =) yay i can talk to someone. Halpins was fun the other night.... shit was crazyyy <3

I would like to talk to my mother...... -xoxo-

Soo this is what it comes down too.. My Mom tottally broke free today.. it was the WORST by far the WORST day of the entire fams drama issues.. To brake it down.. my mom had a litterally crazy moment... me and ryan HAD to call the cops.. it wasnt like we wanted to but... we had too..she got arrested and was gone.... it happend so slow but the time seemed to pass by like nothing. Me and Ry are here by ourselfs for the rest of the night.

 I love Nelly =) and love Linds and Jer for being there for me too but Nelly was here and experienced everything with us...Shes a great person always in her prayers and shes always in ours =) I have never got so close to someone and became such good friends in a short amount of time. I Love Her <3 

School sucks we are the only white people in it... FUCKERS ...

WIERD I dont even kno why i put this on here.... But just to go to show that Brent and I can be loyal friends and talk without wanting to rip eachothers hair out...Were good friends... And Im glad things worked out like this and were both happy and content with who we are with and how everything worked out... Goodluck at Stateee Brenty

Everyone has just been soo great to me about leaving.... Either they're praying or want me to call if anything goes wrong. I got most of all my stuff packed and ready to go... =) Lindsay and Jeremy have been the best about it though...Linds is wiring me money for gas and of course im going to pay her back <3

I thought about it last night and Linds and I have been friends forever i mean i have pictures of us when I frist moved to Davison.... hmm they're cute =) were sooo little. We are the exact same though its soo weird... plus are familys use to be close.... I can count on her for anything.... Tell her anything and I kno she will always help me or have the solution. I have seriously never had that before her.... I dont kno i just want everyone to kno that she means more to me than anything and i honestly dont kno what i would do without her..... Im glad Lindsay Liegh is my Bestfriend =) I will seriously never come back to Floridia without her.

Anyways I went to the beach and out to dinner last night with one of my friends from youth group named Nick... hes a nice guy to hang out with... and if any of you are thinking "OMG your cheating on Jeremy!!" .... well im not i would honestly NEVER do that to him I Love him and wouldnt hurt him like that. Nick is a friend and thats as far as it can go... He knows about Jeremy. EVERYONE knows about Jeremy... Hes all i can talk about. Hes all i like to talk about... and i cant understand it.........Well i geuss i can. And today i went to another friends from youth group Grad party everyone was there.... it was nice seeing all of the girls agian i havent went to the church in FOREVER... I miss it....

I miss you Dad =(  See you soon .... MUAH xoxo

My brother has been soo good to me... we have gotten soo close considering we have noone else except eachother all day long. We went to the mall today that was fun Ryan got a shirt that says "Hang out with your wang out." I laughed .. Anyways there hasnt been one day when Jeremyand I  have been bad... I Love how our relationship has lasted through alllll this stuff and when we see eachother nothing has ever changed.... <3 ...... Just talked to Tori Bear.... I Love her.... I Miss Her.... =( i cant fucking wait to see her!!!!!!!! .... and her family.

Note:: Soo today around the house my Mom was in a bad mood..... wierd... Anyways she was making tacos.. and the taco sauce and meat spilled all over the floor and carpet... and she just starts screaming and looking like she was going to cry..... (Mean while...I  am standing 200 ft from her in the living room just watching to see what she does next....) And then she just flipps out and gets mad.... swearing.... i mean fuckin pissssssseeeedddd..... She looks at me.... and goes "I can't do this...." AND WALKS AWAY FROM THE DAMN TACO SAUCE SCENE!!!!!!!!!!!!....... You think i wanna pick up and scrub all this taco shit up??? ... HAHA You got to be kidding im thinking? ... Well... Im not the hard ass you may all think sometimes to my Mom.... I did it so she would be nice the rest of the day and not bitch about any other thing....

So i went out with Kirby today.... Hes a nice guy .. Black but nice lol we went out to lunch and he showed me around Lieghi ... which was nice i got a good feeling for the surrounding town around me. Talked to my Dad today all is well THANKGOD... Anyways back to the norm. life.... My mom got mad at me today because i wiped off the knife with a napkin and put it into the dishwasher .... she claims i wasted a napkin... lol someone please tell me how that works? I told her i would pay for it then walked away...

I swear Jeremy trys to make me soo happy and sometimes i just dont get it ... i called him on the payphone a little bit ago and when i talked to him last he was smoking with Jon  and just being wierd.....He's always like Are you sure your going to do this... Are you sure? Are you sure? Are you sure? Why did you spend your money on that stupid stuff?.... and i just want to be like....."SHUT THE FUCK UP!!!!!"   But i didnt because i care how he feels .... I hung up without saying I love you and Bye.... maybe that will shut him up..... goodness.... And the fact he went over Jarrids last night..... Bothered me i have no idea why...I trust him more than anything. Im just moody i geuss right now and i cant wait to see everyone agian.

I Love You Jer .... <3

I cant belive what i am about to attempt... Driving 2,000 miles 27 hours .... by MYSELF am i crazy? or have i just seriously lost my mind. I figure once i get up there though it will be okay i mean ill have my cats the whole way soo that wont be that hard. My dad will make a better life for me i know for a fact. My reasonings are that i need to get a bunch of shit done that i left undone when i left for Flordia.... like senior pics, new contacts, my senior year and my Dad most of all. I miss him like no other even though it prollie doesnt even phase his mind that i am gone because he always compares me to my mom and i kno he hates her =/ ... i much rather be with him though instead of her. I hope everything with me and Jer works out.... i know it will though were perfect....We have been telling eachother I Love You and coming from both of us that means alot... just because we kno whats its like to have are heartbroken and how hard it is to Love someone agian but i geuss we both did it and it worked out perfect.

I call him on the pay phone atleast 6 times a day..... and if your wondering why.... its because my mom cancled are cell phones and long distance.... she has completly lost her mind..... hmmm what should i start packing? Wish me luck.... 4 more days =)

I Love You Lindsers =) ,#

Sooo im sitting here in this place i hate to call home...It seems as if i have been walking around like a zombie for the past week  because all i have been doing is getting high off these sleeping pills and never knowing when my legs may collapse....Its not even the feeling i get when im on them that makes me happy its the fact that i escape this 42 year old lady that just sucks the human soul right out of me.... I consider her a drug... the worst drug in that matter. Its the kind of drug that your friends and parents tell you to stay away from. But when you do try it your hurt emointionally physcailly and mentally. And right then you know why your friends and parents told you to say no the frist time. There are side eefects but most of you kno them so... there is no need to get into that. She crushed my ciggarettes the other day.... i got pissed .... My solution: i smoked all of hers. then me and ryan  stole $600 and spent it in the most redicuolus ways ever just because we hate her and we deserved the money. 

I miss you bestfriend* ,#

Every guy i have ever met i compare to you...  <3 jer

thank god anna is online everytime i am on... lol what would i do without talking to her..

Welll i have decided that i am going to get some money wired to me ..... pack my shit and take the fuck off... im just scared my car will brake down and i wont be able to call anyone because i dont have a cell phone but i guess that kindof thinking is negative i can always hickhike... my way back up to michigan.. I misss Jer <3 you..... everything is still perfect and i hope it stays that way. MAUH kisses to everyone

Its sooo hard being away from everyone but i guess i did it to myself. My mom has went completly insane... and i cant even live here. Flordia SUCKS i hate it if i leave here ill NEVER come back..... I miss Jer =( He was down here for a week and it was the most amazing week ever of my entire life. i am in Love <3 Ive only talked to Linds and Tori ... and i geuss its because they are the ones that call and make a effort to talk to me.... i love them and they will always be my bestfriends. Jermey and i had soo much fun anyways.... we went to the beach went out to dinner EVERY night..... went to the pool and got WaStEd haha .... just had the most amzing sex everywhere..... noone and nothihng can compare we have been talking about getting a place and everything so i ho-pe it works out. ....blahhhh i hate florida KILLL MEEE orrr send me the horse... haha.... alcohol is the best drug i can find down here.....which i dont kno if i consider that a good thing or a bad thing? .... But well i geuss i am going to have to suffer for the time being......because i have no car no phone..... but i have made a couple friends which is good.... there so much different from me though.... I went to a club named FUSION...... and it was amazingggggggggg everyone was soo much older than me and completly drunk but i danced all night and by the time we left i was dripping sweat ...very cute boysss =) but none that compared to Jer... blahhhhh i misss you guyhs love you always -Abby

What to say im moving soon! ahhhh..... what to do..... im over jermeys right now we are good =) i think??... yet i hope. Hes coming down to florida on July 29th =) yay.... charlie is going to be there haha fucker. Miss you nicole loveeeeee MAUH!

ohhh stearnsy stearnsy stearnsy.........too many memories in such a short amount of time.... Me and jermey have gotten soo close since i have got home... i am with him eveynight ... i dont kno whats up. I love tori.... and i have to go because we are making LASSSAAAAGGGAAANNNNAAAAA lasanga? ... i dunno how to spell

 

Still <3 you

soooo happy Rygar called me today he has been soo active i love it... Were going out to dinner on Thursday and then... hmm i have noo idea... We r good =) ...     Got things leared over with the Charlie Bear and everything is A ok..... his friend is fuckin hot though.... too bad i couldnt get with him =/ .... lol ,#

Another day with the excitment of playing water-volleyball with the old men =)

What was i thinking..... competing agianst your boxing gloves....

Shit is not going my way..... Im pissed.  I miss Rygar. <3

I starting crying today because i miss my life ... uhhhh everything has changed soooo fast and recent for me its hard to coop with.... my mom is dating a guy 14 yrs. younger than her.... god i hate her for it. i want to go back to when we were all in 8th grade and me and nicole were little shits =) haha..

Alright well whatever this text is just going to have to do..... God i havent written in sooo long that i forgot where i left off....Well i got snitched on today with some other people too.... god what the fuck... when did the world become drug free ... someone please tell me. Fuck Harris peice of shit. Well all is well for the mean time and during the rest of the time hell is broke loose and everybody looses their mind. -> blah i defiantly lost mine today but, for some reason i called Brent when we barley ever talk... and he made me think in a whole new perspective on things and i felt soo much better. sooo i guess "Thanks Brent"... Anywho Charlie hasnt called and when he does call its his friends acting sooooo ungodly perverted. yuck fuckin perve. Anywho Garcia and i are good...i got affection last night for the frist time in a week. I think its hard for us. ohh well we love each other.. haha and everyone knows it but wont say a word...I feel as if i do not have one other girl to call except for Tory because she is the only girl that hangs out with all the guys too. God i just wanna move to Florida ... and restart.
   <3 me

Alot of shit has went on this week and to my belief i have pulled it off agian! =) Im doing good this week and alll the bad has just flew in one ear and out the other ... if it wasnt for whitni and manda  these past few weeks i dont think i would be sane. My dad is leaving agian and to my surprise he stayed longer than i thought =). I got grounded today (suposly) for calling my parents pot heads... haha well i have a clear idea that they are. I love being care free and not so emointional anymore because  the emotional shit just wasnt working out. Well i have to go break it up  =)  much <3

I can be by myself .... i can be by myself..... thinking about today, yesterday and the day before ....i dont kno how i possibly got through them. I miss my Dad I miss Brent... i miss everything old to me...My parents hate eachother and are splitting. i see my dad once a week... and for that entire hour i see him i cry cuz i miss him soo much =(  I love my Dad he means the whole world to me. I hate myself for always being mean to brent but its like i put up a wall becuse i dont want him to be to me or to hurt me... which is kinda pointless i geuss u could say. Life is shitty right now and everything thing else is bothering the FUCK out of me.... i cant wait to get away from my friends except manda... lol shes the only one as of right now i can stand ohh well fuck the world.... i aint a fuckin peace core. ooh and nicole lol haha i still love them.

Well dont we just hate stupid bitches....its no wonder i hate half the fuckin population of Davison... because they all think there fuckin cool fuckin people.... when really there a bunch of fake assholes... God what the hell davison high school needs to grow up... and fuck whoever says different if i asked for your opinon it would be nessary to state but since i didnt , dont fuckin even think of one... and if im pissing you off by saying all this stuff then stop fuckin reading it you fag and learn to grow up maybe like your other fellow schoolmates. Join along FUCKER no one likes you anyways... and everyone thats reading this and have made it this far of reading complete ass bullshit..... maybe you need to get a fucking life and stop reading other peoples....cuz this is not one of problems... it is an annoyance. Sooo my advice is to STOP......fall off a bridge and think about what else you could be doing =) have a horrible day..... cuz im having a good one =)
Ps: Right now i could KILL Brent..... grrr how much more bi-polar can he get?

Well im in trouble agian....when arent i in trouble? Its like i get in more trouble because i know i cant cross a further line. Ohh well at least i have have more of a positive outlook on things then i did a year ago....Well infact a year ago i didnt get in as much trouble... i was just a psycho... (note: only ME can call me a psycho.) Well there are two people i trust more than anyting right now because friends are shitty. You cant trust anyone except your family...thats what everyone has told me sence i was little but thats not  true at all. I got the whole horrible kid thing today when i didnt do shit to hear it. And i got the whole kick out thing when im 18 too. In my opinon i cant wait to get the fuck out of here its like ive been living in hell for my whole highschool years. =)

 I can trust my two bestfriends ......and i have conviced myself that me and you are Together/ Going out whatever you want to call it. Only because i love you and i miss you <3.....come home.
life would be so much easier if you just died =/ sorry to say.

AHHHHHH  i miss youuuuu =(  The sun is held captive in your eyes <3.

You are a dumb fucking peice of shit.... and i hate you right now. -> you make life hell....and well this is not my idea of a happy ending... Gr i HATE YOU!

I havent written in a while... and well i dont know why. I dont answer my phone either which is wierd because im always looking for a way out of bordom but latly i want to be bored. So much has gone on... sooo let me fill you in....

* I got a hostess/waitress job at Paliani's...=) FUN!

* I got grounded for coming home stoned ... and well to think how much  trouble i get into when im around that stuff made me wanna quit soo i did...A few days ago. Which is good. I got my ciggs an a occasionall drink or too sometimes i geuss.

I Miss not seeing Adam everyday... that sucks...Brents going off to college GOD were soo fucking old... i cant belive it... its been over two years now that i think about it.... ill always love him. =)

I just came home from the Alanis Morsette concert...her music is soo intreging.. I love it. 

Note:: I went and Made a deal which SHOULD OF went wrong....But the pussy as he is....didnt drive away when i got the money....sooo sooo wrong of him. Gr... Love Love Love....

Seeing how things change i have realised from all of my experiences... that I dont need a boyfriend. I dont need that to deal with a helpless obsictcal to get over. I also dont need friends to do what i want to do. I dont need anyone to help me i got this on my own. I can stand HERE on my two feet....

I Love Adam, Not like the real thing love but Adam is my bestfriend. He's like my brother we fight like brother and sister. I gotta call him soon. Im starting to get bored. And its only 11:36 am. I like being single. =) very much. I love doing what I want to do. Im going to the Alanis Morsette concert tomm. <3 with Manda =) Im excited. This was a pointless  entry but i thought id write anyways because its like a obligation. Love Love Love.....I got  $45 =) bye!

Well im sitting over Marshalls with Adam watching video games... not bored just because i know what were going to be doing in a little while.. =) love love love for it. -> i did this exact same stuff yesterday haha i love it. I love my friends... the four of em that i have =) I do think i have alot of friends... there just not really considered friends.... they are the kind of people you can sometimes get together with but then after that it takes you a week to call em agian. ha good thinking abby. Well i have to go do what all of you want to be doing right now =) Bye!
To many toxics...=) .... Me* Adam* Manda* Marsh
You find intrest in me and i find intrest in you. =)

Both of you are fading and quickly. I love not having to supply you with your control. Leaning in and pushing your buttons is killing you. But when you push mine they reject and my feelings dont change. Stronger and Stronger i am. 

Glancing at you makes my world turn*

Im sick of these typical days....typical friends....and typical moments that shouldnt even happen. What i need is just to move away where everything is new and the people arent the same. Ive been moody today with a few people and i few thoughts. I told Adam that i didnt like him like he thought i did... and well..... he kicked Me and Manda out... ha. I realised how immature i was in the relationship with Brent because of what Adam did to me...I regret soo much about me and Brent...ooh well... Things are going good for me...

 

Looking through glass at you... =)

oohh hung out with Marsh Marsh today =) that was very nice...i miss having him around...its like a secret crush. Wierd.

   Then shit-head got mad....HAHA puss. i love you? No. I dont love you* either?... what has gone wrong here with me? Keep me away from it.... all of it pleaseeee. Im wondering...Do women go through this just too stress out or is this just my wrost case senerio? Love and what it has done to are minds. I have figured out that there is no mixed signals with guys. The guy either likes you or he dont. Orrrrr even better hes madly in love with you.... Then what is there to do...not like him back? Why cant i ever like the guys that are sweet and love me to death. I find that the biggest turn off ever... and why i have no idea.. =/  I want the mean hard to get older guys....Odd.. no. The other day i caught myslef looking at a 28-32 year old at the Muffler Man....and wow i didnt know that greased up guys could turn me on the well... hmm i have to get going before this hard-on goes limp.

I panicked.....freaked out....nothing like it before... Greatttt stufff.

1st night in. Hate it. craving it. BOOM. -> were starting small and growing big. but i think about your friends...is that normal? .... then yesterday i saw him* while i was with you....god i wanted to cry. I didnt.  Love no one...it feels good.

 I miss you Issy.....please come back =(

Crazy night. He took care of me bought me everything i needed just like every day/night....I cried to him on the phone for awhile cuz i didnt have a ride home. Then he called dave and dave came and got me.....GOD im sooo glad i have friends. I was stranded till 130.... Boo.... booo booo boooooooooooo  

Huff huff ....POOF .... im still here?

what am i doing, what am i doing, what am i doing, what am i doing, what am i doing!!!!!

Think...your mom and dad's generation...they didnt grow up untill there mid 20's... and we....right now are growing up trying to act like were 30.......ahhhh why did this have to happen to us.... please someone tell meeeeeee
